{"id":1454930965,"question_id":3250,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1731816335,"status":14,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1454930965/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Square Area by Removing Fences From a Field","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int maximizeSquareArea(int m, int n, vector<int>& hFences, vector<int>& vFences) {\n        int mod = 1e9+7;\n        set<long long> hSet; //ordered\n        set<long long> vSet; //ordered\n        hFences.push_back(1);\n        hFences.push_back(m);\n        vFences.push_back(1);\n        vFences.push_back(n);\n        sort(hFences.begin(), hFences.end());\n        sort(vFences.begin(), vFences.end());\n        for(int i=0; i<hFences.size(); i++) {\n            for(int j=i+1; j<hFences.size(); j++) {\n                hSet.insert(hFences[j]-hFences[i]);\n            };\n        };\n        for(int i=0; i<vFences.size(); i++) {\n            for(int j=i+1; j<vFences.size(); j++) {\n                vSet.insert(vFences[j]-vFences[i]);\n            };\n        };       \n        long long ans = 0;\n        for(auto h:hSet) {\n            if(vSet.find(h) !=vSet.end() ) {\n                long long area = (long long) (h*h);\n                if(area > ans)\n                    ans = area % mod;\n            }\n        };\n        if(ans==0)\n            return -1;\n        return ans % mod;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-square-area-by-removing-fences-from-a-field","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
